reviewText: Very cool process to add to your skill set. These guys know their stuff and are willing to share soak it up!

This is a good dvd worth the time to watch, practice, then watch again and practice more.  My only regret about the information is that the hammer forming is about 20% of the work.  The secret is making the form or plug (good form good part).  More information about building the form/plug is needed (tools, materials, techniques).
